resources.string:
There are just a few things you need to do before you can use this app for the first time. 

 * set up your KeyStore 
 * set a Master Password/phrase 
 * export your Certificate
Do you have a KeyStore backup you want to import?
You have successfully initialised this application. Click YES to proceed - you will be asked to re-enter your password at the next screen
File is not a txt file or is too large to be displayed - do you wish to open the file with an app on your device?\n\nNOTE: This requires the file being temporarily written to your external cache
